description: JUST MASKING THOSE WRINKLES ON YOUR FACE IS FIGHTING A LOSING BATTLE: WIN THE WARSun damage undermines all your repair work, Ultraviolet (UV) and Infrared radiation (IR) causes premature aging!Even though you make surface repairs, UV and IR radiation still cause damage deep in your skin; destroying collagen and elastin. There's a simple and effective answer.It's a revolution in anti aging treatment.- Ageless Glow is a light weight SPF 45, containing an innovative blend of actives- Protects skin from UVA, UVB & Infrared Radiation known to cause premature aging- It delivers a new strategy in sun protection providing the highest possible level of protection while restoring youthfulness to the skin- A clinically proven product as used by Hollywood Stars.This fast-absorbing SPF also features a high level of Niacinamide to promote a smoother, clearer complexion.Derived from Knotweed Extract, our botanically-based active is the first of its kind, preventing damage from infrared radiation, which is believed to be just as detrimental to skin health as UVA & UVB.Enjoy theSecret Beverly Hills Formulathat the Hollywood Stars have known for years. So nothing to lose and a naturally youthful complexion to gain!You deserve to stay young!Hit that "Add to Cart" button now!
